title: Service disruption on the North-South Line due to traction power fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 牵引力故障导致南北线服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan disebabkan oleh kerosakan kuasa tarikan
title_translations.ta: தன்னியக்க விசை செயலிழப்பு காரணமாக வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service from #YioChuKang to #Bishan towards Marina Bay is now operating normally.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #YioChuKang to #Bishan towards MarinaBay due to a traction power fault.
